name: About Notesminute
description_1: Notesminute is a platform to access Side Headings and Simple Notes to remember any concept.
description_2: We help students to keep Exam Tantrums at Bay.
description_3: We are a '.COM' company with '.ORG' thought process.

name: How it works NotesMinute
description_1: Here is a quick view on how to use NotesMintue. Accessing the notes through quick tips and side headings is a proven method worldwide to remember the concepts.
description_2: Here we give you a complete collection of Side Heading and Quick Notes.
description_3: The notes are free for anyone to access with a desire to learn.

name: Apply for Internship - First Batch 2021
description_1: We help students to overcome Exam Tantrums by making learning simple. We are looking to partner with students who want to work with us for this cause.
description_2: All the notes are free to access to anyone across the globe with an interest to learn.
description_3: We are aligned with UNSDG Goal 4 to provide access to quality education to everyone without any discrimination.
description_4: We are collating quick notes across Arts, Science, Engineering, Diploma, Medicine, etc.
